title: Udeshi Salgado
text: Iâ€™m a PhD researcher at Cardiff University. My research focuses on hybrid intelligence and vaccine demand forecasting in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs). Iâ€™m particularly interested in combining domain knowledge with probabilistic models to improve public health supply chains.
